sentences.en: All right! You shall repent this.
Bitterly did we repent our decision.
sentences.cn: 我们非常后悔做此决定.

sentences.en: Did he repent of anything in his life?
sentences.cn: 他一生中有什么后悔的事情吗？

sentences.en: Don't you repent having wasted your money so foolishly?
sentences.cn: 你不后悔如此糊涂地乱花钱 吗 ?
既便现在, 我也不后悔.

sentences.en: He is kind and gracious to all sinners who repent.
sentences.cn: 他对忏悔的罪人一概慈悲为怀.

sentences.en: I am a sinner and I need to repent of my sins.
sentences.cn: 我是个罪人，必须忏悔我的罪过。

sentences.en: It is never too late to repent.
Marry in haste and repent at leisure.
Remission of sins is promised to those who repent.
That will leave thee powerless even to repent?
sentences.cn: —它已经折磨得你甚至无力去悔改了!

sentences.en: There will come a day when you will repent of this.
sentences.cn: 总有一天,你会后悔这件事的.

sentences.en: Those who refuse to repent, he said, will be punished.
sentences.cn: 那些拒不悔改的人，他说，将会受到惩罚。

sentences.en: You have sinned and must repent your ways.
sentences.cn: 你犯了罪，必须为你的所作所为作出忏悔。

trans.tran_cn: [植] 匍匐生根的；[动] 爬行的
trans.tran_en: lying or creeping along the ground; reptant

trans.tran_cn: 后悔, 悔改, 忏悔, 悔悟
trans.tran_en: to be sorry for something and wish you had not done it – used especially when considering your actions in a religious way
to be sorry for something and wish you had not done it – used especially when considering your actions in a religious way

trans.tran_cn: 对（自己的所为）感到懊悔或忏悔
